text: Too Young to Love is a 1959 British courtroom drama movie directed by Muriel Box and was based on the play Pickup Girl by Elsa Shelley. It stars Pauline Hahn, Austin Willis, Vivian Matalon, Jess Conrad, Alan Gifford, Bessie Love, Cec Linder, Miki Iveria. ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Muriel Box
title: Too Young to Love
